extension.name: Favicon Tag Generator - Gantry Extension (Hydrogen)
extension.author: Andreas Kar
extension.description:
Favicon Tag Generator - Extension for Gantry Framework

 Andreas Kar (andreas.kar@gmx.at)

NOTE: This extension is installed for the Gantry Hydrogen.
If you want to install the atom on a different Gantry template, you must manually copy the two files assets.yaml to /templates/[NOME-TEMPLATE]/custom/engine/templatescustom/engine/blueprints/page and page_head.html.twig to /templates/[TEMPLATE]/custom/engine/templates.
